      Methods in org._7hills.liueri19.game that return types with arguments of type Move 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Move> Board.getHistory()
      Returns a List of Move objects representing the previous moves played.
      java.util.List<Move> Piece.getLegalMoves()
      Returns a List of Move objects containing all legal moves.
      java.util.List<Move> Piece.getThreats()
      Returns a List of Move objects representing the threats this Piece is posing.
      For pieces other than King and Pawn, this method is equivalent to getLegalMoves().
      java.util.List<Move> King.getThreats() 
      Methods in org._7hills.liueri19.game with parameters of type Move 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Piece.addLegalMove(Move move)
      Add a Move to the existing list of legal moves.
      protected void Piece.addThreat(Move move)
      Add a Move to the existing list of threats.
      For pieces other than King and Pawn, this method is equivalent to addLegalMove().
      protected void King.addThreat(Move move) 
      boolean Piece.isLegalMove(Move move)
      Returns true if the specified Move is legal (in the list of legal moves), and false otherwise.æ–¹
      boolean Piece.isThreatening(Move move)
      Returns true if the specified Move is threatened, false otherwise.
      For pieces other than King and Pawn, this method is equivalent to isLegalMove().
      boolean Piece.move(Move move)
      Move this Piece as described by the Move object.
